pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sati karaṇīye senaṁ gantvā atirekatirattaṁ senāya vasanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.5: Amhākampi alābhā, amhākampi dulladdhaṁ, ye mayaṁ ājīvassa hetu puttadārassa kāraṇā senāya paṭivasāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.6: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.8: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atirekatirattaṁ senāya vasissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.9: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, atirekatirattaṁ senāya vasathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.12: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, atirekatirattaṁ senāya vasissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.15.1: “Siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo senaṁ gamanāya, dirattatirattaṁ tena bhikkhunā senāya vasitabbaṁ. Tato ce uttari vaseyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:2.1.1: Siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo senaṁ gamanāyāti
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:2.1.6: catutthe divase atthaṅgate sūriye senāya vasati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:2.2.1: Atirekatiratte atirekasaññī senāya vasati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:2.2.2: Atirekatiratte vematiko senāya vasati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:2.2.3: Atirekatiratte ūnakasaññī senāya vasati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:2.3.4: dve rattiyo vasitvā tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasati,
